meanings.sent1: I immixed the colors to create a new shade.

meanings.definition: Mixed together in a uniform manner
meanings.sent1: The immixed solution had a consistent color throughout.
meanings.sent2: The immixed paint dried evenly on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The immixed crowd moved as one entity at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The immixed pattern on the fabric was pleasing to the eye.
